title: The worst jobs in the world revealed
text: Share this article Share The workers in this photo are paid to sniff the armpits of volunteers as part of a quality control procedure for a deodorant brand As if having to waddle around dressed as a boat isn't bad enough, pictured left, the employee on the right is required to wear a large cup with no holes for arms or a head The exact nature of this task is unclear, but what we do know is that the worker pictured is quite far up an elephant's bottom, and there's nothing fun about that These women appear to be promoting a brand of loo cleaner for some marketing whiz who thought it would be a good idea to strap toilets onto their backs for extra impact Whether this role was ever actually filled will remain a mystery, but the job requirement was bizarre to say the least This is perfectly common in farming, but we rarely see the workers whose job it is to operate a mechanical cow for the purposes of an ejaculating bull According to this uploader, the Indian man depicted was hired to disguise himself as an ape in order to 'combat a monkey invasion' You wouldn't want to be the electrician tasked with fixing a problem here, where the tangled cables are surely a nightmare to work with The user who shared this snap with the world wrote of it: 'When you think your job is s*** just remember you could be a dildo dipper' The jovial man in this image captioned his shot: 'See you guys later, I've got a 45-year-old sewage tank to explore!' This image was captioned: 'Technical difficulties with a roller coaster and this guy's job is to ride it alone and see what's wrong with it. Worst job ever' It is not known exactly where this office is located, but it's likely you've never worked with such little desk space And finally, at least the owner of this sewage transporter has a sense of humour, with the slogan: '#1 Company in the #2 business' Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
